definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The group also spearheads various social programs in China.
sentences.chinese: 該組織還帶頭參與中國的各種社會活動。

sentences.english: Greening the Beige (GtB) is a volunteer community event and network.
sentences.chinese: 點費成綠是一個志願參與的社會活動網絡。

sentences.english: I believe that we're gradually learning in our society.
sentences.chinese: 我相信我們在社會活動中學習成長。

sentences.english: Music and dancing were activities involving the whole of tribal society.
sentences.chinese: 樂舞一般是部落社會的全體社會活動。

sentences.english: Social activity should be on your agenda this week.
sentences.chinese: 本週你的日程之中應有社會活動。

sentences.english: She thrived on an active social life.
sentences.chinese: 她在豐富的社會活動中茁壯成長。

sentences.english: I make it a habit not to socialize on weekdays.
sentences.chinese: 我養成了不在週一到週五參加社會活動的習慣。

sentences.english: Education is a social activity which aims at cultivating talents.
sentences.chinese: 教育是以人爲培養對象的一種社會活動。

sentences.english: Possess and combat difficulties in science, art and community.
sentences.chinese: 在科技，文體，社會活動中不怕困難拼搏進取。

sentences.english: This should be not only a financial issue, but a social one.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅僅是一個財務問題，也是一種社會活動。

sentences.english: According to this J1 employer, social activities in this locality are very accessible.
sentences.chinese: 社會活動在此區域是很便利的。

definition: to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
